text:
You can leverage your content marketing expertise to create targeted content and distribute it via PR channels. Start small by building your content asset around a specific sub domain of your niche and a few targeted verticals. Build social media snippets from them and repurpose for multiple channels but build a month long campaign. As an additional step reach out to influencers, web sites and podcasters to partner with you for content and promote your offerings. 

If you follow this for a few months, you will have a good data points on what's workings and what's not. But I want to emphasise the importance of building great content upfront. Without that, your PR will be just fluff.
